snippet: During four mini-shows that culminated just after Paris Fashion Week, Azzedine Alaïa presented pieces that demanded an intimate viewing.
abstract: Designer Azzedine Alaia presents new collection during series of four mini-shows following Paris Fashion Week.
lead_paragraph: During four mini-shows that culminated just after Paris Fashion Week, Azzedine Alaïa presented pieces that demanded an intimate viewing.

headline.main: At Alaïa, Clothes That Are Ready for Their Close-Ups
headline.print_headline: Alaïa Thinks It’s Time for a Hug
